Client boto3 SageMaker API Specs¶

data_ml_utils.boto3_botocore_client.client_emr.AwsEMRServices¶

class data_ml_utils.boto3_botocore_client.client_emr.AwsEMRServices¶
Initialises EMR client.

:param : None.

The AwsEMRServices class does not take in any parameters to initialise it.

create_emr_cluster¶

create_emr_cluster(
master_instance_type: str,
core_instance_type: str,
core_instance_count: int,
configurations: List,
applications: List,
log_uri: str,
task_id: str,
identifier: str,
bidprice: str)
creates EMR cluster
Parameters

  • master_instance_type (str) – name of ec2 instance for master node

  • core_instance_type (str) – name of ec2 instance for slave nodes

  • core_instance_count (int) – number of slave instances

  • configurations (List) – configuration of EMR cluster

  • applications (List) – applications for EMR cluster

  • log_uri (str) – s3 directory of loggings

  • task_id (str) – task identifier

  • identifier (str) – date identifier of task

  • bidprice (str) – bidprice of spot ec2 instances

Returns

response; response of API return

Return type

dict

check_emr_cluster_status¶

check_emr_cluster_status(cluster_id: str)¶
check emr cluster that is created
Parameters

cluster_id (str) – identifier of cluster

Returns

non exit function value if successful

Return type

int

terminate_emr_cluster(cluster_id: str)¶
terminate created cluster
Parameters

cluster_id (str) – identifier of cluster

Returns

non exit function value if successful

get_cluster_id(task_id: str, identifier: str)¶
retrieve cluster identifier string value
Parameters

  • task_id (str) – task identifer

  • identifier (str) – task date identifier

Returns

cluster_id; EMR cluster identifier

get_emr_master_dns_name(cluster_id: str)¶
retrieve cluster master node dns address
Parameters

cluster_id (str) – identifier of cluster

Returns

dns_name; EMR cluster master dns name

spin_up_emr_cluster¶

spin_up_emr_cluster(
master_instance_type: str,
core_instance_type: str,
core_instance_count: int,
configurations: List,
applications: List,
log_uri: str,
task_id: str,
identifier: str,
bidprice: str)
wrapper function to spin up EMR cluster and checks EMR cluster status
Parameters

  • master_instance_type (str) – name of ec2 instance for master node

  • core_instance_type (str) – name of ec2 instance for slave nodes

  • core_instance_count (int) – number of slave instances

  • configurations (List) – configuration of EMR cluster

  • applications (List) – applications for EMR cluster

  • log_uri (str) – s3 directory of loggings

  • task_id (str) – task identifier

  • identifier (str) – date identifier of task

  • bidprice (str) – bidprice of spot ec2 instances

Returns

non exit function value if successful

Return type

int
